1.title: AMERICA'S SWEETHEARTS

4.title: PUFFIN
clues: The puffin's number one enemy is the great black-backed variety of this "sea" bird

From the puffin's black-&-white look, its scientific name, fratercula arctica, means "little" this "of the north"
